synopsis.text: Financial instability has been the harsh reality for Kimimaro Yoga, a hardworking college student, ever since his father vanished and his mother passed away. His life takes a dramatic turn when a mysterious man offers him a chance to escape his financial woes by entering the enigmatic Financial District. In this parallel world, wealth is abundant, but it comes at a steep price - his future. As an Entre, Kimimaro must engage in high-stakes duels called Deals, where his collateral and fortune are on the line. As he navigates this treacherous world, he must adapt quickly to protect his future and uncover the true value of money. With the fate of the real world hanging in the balance, can Kimimaro rise to the challenge and confront the most powerful player in the Financial District?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
